hero.text:
We think and design unique experiences
for tomorrow's innovative digital enterprise services.

dynamicText.github: Take a look at our work.

aboutBlock.title: Close to customers across
aboutBlock.desc: Founded in 1993, Lunatech is a software development consultancy company. Lunatech employs around 100 people and operates from its headquarters in Rotterdam as well as office in Paris.

about.title: Custom software systems for over
about.text: Lunatech was founded in 1993 as an IT consulting, product research and development team. As a team of adept self-managing programmers, working with a very experienced commercial team, Lunatech has a successful track record of implementing medium-sized to large systems. Our skills are best applied in designing and building back office systems whereby a web interface is just one of many external user- interfaces. Lunatech is an international company with offices in the Netherlands and France. With over 11+ revenue and 90+ people, Lunatech is growing organically. We excel at going into an organisation, analysing their requirements, and then - together with the customer - designing and building a system to meet their needs. Lunatech exists for more than 30 years and helped numerous customers. We work to an interactive development process. We build applications in a number of short iterations. This provides great visibility to the customer and it greatly improves the end result because the product and expectations can be adjusted along the way. With a proud record of providing professional IT services for large corporations, you’ll find us highly technical, very creative, and flexible. Lunatech is also NEN-4400-1 and TISAX certified, European Open Source consortium and Eclipse foundation member delivering on open source.

firstBlock.title: Close to customers across
firstBlock.desc: Lunatech was founded in 1993 as an IT consulting, product research and development team. As a team of adept self-managing programmers, working with a very experienced commercial team, Lunatech has a successful track record of implementing medium-sized to large systems. Our skills are best applied in designing and building back office systems whereby a web interface is just one of many external user- interfaces. Lunatech is an international company with offices in the Netherlands and France. With over 11+ revenue and 90+ people, Lunatech is growing organically. We excel at going into an organisation, analysing their requirements, and then - together with the customer - designing and building a system to meet their needs. Lunatech exists for more than 30 years and helped numerous customers. We work to an interactive development process. We build applications in a number of short iterations. This provides great visibility to the customer and it greatly improves the end result because the product and expectations can be adjusted along the way. With a proud record of providing professional IT services for large corporations, you’ll find us highly technical, very creative, and flexible. Lunatech is also NEN-4400-1 and TISAX certified, European Open Source consortium and Eclipse foundation member delivering on open source.

secondBlock.title: Customised products to meet your
secondBlock.desc:
Lunatech specialises in the design, development, deployment and ongoing operation of customised software solutions to complex challenges.

Each application is meticulously designed to meet the specific requirements of our customers.

visions.1: Our work is characterised by a deep commitment to quality, underpinned by a methodical approach to software development.
visions.2: At the heart of Lunatech's ethos is a penchant for simplicity and pragmatism.
visions.3: This conviction is rooted in the notion that truly effective software is both intuitive and robust, devoid of superfluous complexities.
visions.4: Such an approach not only serves to bolster the software's reliability, but also enhances its adaptability and maintainability.

expertise.title: Custom software systems for over
expertise.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital enterprise services through the following services.

strategicExpertise.title: Strategic Expertise
strategicExpertise.text: We help companies develop IT strategies that support their business goals.

softwareDefinedVehicle.title: Software Defined Vehicle
softwareDefinedVehicle.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

softwareProjectDelivery.title: Software Project Delivery
softwareProjectDelivery.text: We develop custom software to meet your specific needs.

systemIntegration.title: System Integration
systemIntegration.text: We integrate existing systems and third-party applications into your digital ecosystem.

legacyModernisation.title: Legacy Systems Modernisation
legacyModernisation.text: We modernise legacy systems to make them more secure, agile and efficient.

expertisesPage.title: Meet your needs with our
expertisesPage.text: We provide a wide range of expertises to help you meet your needs. We are experts in the following areas:

firstBlock.title: can help you with the following

technoPlanning.title: Technology planning
technoPlanning.text: Developing long-term IT strategies and roadmaps that support business goals.

riskManagement.title: Risk management
riskManagement.text: Identifying and mitigating IT-related risks, such as security threats and data breaches

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Keeping abreast of emerging technologies and assessing their potential impact on the organization.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.text: Ensuring data is handled securely, compliantly, and used strategically.

changeManagement.title: Change Management
changeManagement.text: Implementing IT changes smoothly to minimize disruption.

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation
digitalTransformation.text: Leading efforts to transform traditional processes with digital technologies.

secondBlock.title: can help you with the following
secondBlock.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital business services through the following services.

technologies.title: Our
technologies.carouselText: With 30 years' experience in IT consulting, we offer a range of technologies to meet your immediate needs and support your future growth.

automotive.title: Automotive
automotive.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.text: Developing interactive platforms to offer immersive entertainment experiences.

finance.title: Financial
finance.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.text: Creating digital data management and analysis products for the insurance industry.

paragraphes[0].title: Powering Innovation with Cutting-Edge Technology
paragraphes[0].text: At Lunatech, we leverage a diverse range of technologies to deliver innovative, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our deep technical expertise spans cloud computing, system integration, software development, data management, and more, enabling us to build and modernize IT infrastructures that drive business success. Here’s how our technologies align with the expertises we provide

paragraphes[1].title: Cloud Computing
paragraphes[1].technologies: AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, Red Hat OpenShift, etc...
paragraphes[1].expertise: Strategic Expertise, Software Defined Vehicle (SDV), System Integration, Legacy Modernization
paragraphes[1].text: We utilize cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, and Red Hat OpenShift to provide scalable, reliable infrastructure for our clients. These technologies are central to our cloud-based solutions, ensuring flexibility, security, and cost-efficiency across various projects. Whether it's developing cloud-native applications, integrating cloud services with existing systems, or modernizing legacy applications, our cloud expertise is foundational to our success in these areas.

paragraphes[2].title: System Integration & Middleware
paragraphes[2].technologies: APIs, Middleware, Kafka, Enterprise Service Buses (ESBs), etc...
paragraphes[2].expertise: System Integration, Software Defined Vehicle (SDV), Strategic Expertise
paragraphes[2].text: Effective system integration is crucial for creating cohesive IT environments. Our expertise in using APIs, middleware, Kafka, and ESBs allows us to connect disparate systems seamlessly. This is particularly important in our System Integration projects, where we ensure data flows efficiently between different platforms, and in SDV projects, where real-time data processing is essential. These technologies also support our Strategic Expertise by enabling the integration of new technologies with existing systems.

paragraphes[3].title: Software Development Frameworks
paragraphes[3].expertise: Software Project Delivery, Legacy Modernization, Strategic Expertise
paragraphes[3].technologies: Java, Scala, Kotlin, Spring Framework, Hibernate, Quarkus, Play Framework, etc...
paragraphes[3].text: Our software development frameworks, including Java, Scala, Kotlin, Spring, Hibernate, Quarkus, and Play Framework, are the backbone of our Software Project Delivery expertise. These technologies allow us to build robust, scalable, and secure applications tailored to the unique needs of our clients. They also play a key role in Legacy Modernization, where we update and refactor older systems to meet modern standards, and in our Strategic Expertise, where we develop software solutions that align with broader business goals.

paragraphes[4].title: Front-End Development
paragraphes[4].technologies: Typescript, Next.js, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, SASS, Figma, etc...
paragraphes[4].text: In today’s digital landscape, a compelling and responsive user interface is crucial. Our front-end development technologies—Next.js, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and SASS—enable us to create user-friendly, visually appealing web applications. These are essential in Software Project Delivery, where we focus on creating intuitive interfaces, and in Legacy Modernization, where we refresh and modernize the user experience of older applications.

paragraphes[5].title: Data Management & Analytics
paragraphes[5].expertise: System Integration, Strategic Expertise, Software Defined Vehicle (SDV)
paragraphes[5].technologies: PostgreSQL, Cassandra, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL, MariaDB, etc...
paragraphes[5].text: Data is at the heart of modern business operations. We use powerful databases like PostgreSQL, Cassandra, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL, and MariaDB to manage, store, and analyze large volumes of data. These technologies are crucial for System Integration projects, where they ensure seamless data exchange, and for SDV projects, where real-time data processing is critical. In our Strategic Expertise, data management technologies support informed decision-making and enhance overall business intelligence.

paragraphes[6].title: DevOps & CI/CD
paragraphes[6].expertise: Software Project Delivery, Legacy Modernization, System Integration
paragraphes[6].technologies: Jenkins, GitLab CI, CloudBees, Bitbucket, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, etc...
paragraphes[6].text: DevOps practices are integral to modern software development, ensuring rapid, reliable, and repeatable deployment processes. We utilize Jenkins, GitLab CI, CloudBees, Bitbucket, GitHub Actions, and Azure DevOps to automate and streamline the software development lifecycle. These tools are vital in Software Project Delivery, where they enable continuous integration and delivery, and in Legacy Modernization, where they help manage the transition from legacy to modern systems. In System Integration, these tools ensure that new integrations are deployed smoothly and efficiently.

paragraphes[7].title: Infrastructure & Orchestration
paragraphes[7].expertise: System Integration, Software Defined Vehicle (SDV), Legacy Modernization
paragraphes[7].technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Bash, Linux, Python, etc...
paragraphes[7].text: Efficient infrastructure management is key to supporting scalable, resilient applications. We use Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Bash, and Linux to automate and orchestrate infrastructure deployment and management. These technologies are essential in System Integration, where they enable the seamless deployment of integrated systems, and in SDV projects, where they support the complex infrastructure needs of modern vehicles. In Legacy Modernization, they help transition legacy systems to modern, cloud-based environments.

paragraphes[8].title: Security & Identity Management
paragraphes[8].text: Security is paramount in all our projects. We utilize Keycloak and SSO ForgeRock to manage user identities, authenticate users, and ensure secure access to applications. These technologies are crucial in our Strategic Expertise, where we design secure systems that protect sensitive data, and in System Integration, where they ensure that integrated systems maintain robust security protocols.

paragraphes[9].title: Legacy Systems Modernization
paragraphes[9].technologies: Flyway, Quarkus, Akka, Migration Tools (Terraform, Ansible), etc...
paragraphes[9].text: Modernizing legacy systems is a complex but necessary process for businesses looking to stay competitive. We use Flyway, Quarkus, Akka, and other migration tools like Terraform and Ansible to update and revitalize outdated systems. These technologies ensure that legacy systems are brought up to date with modern standards, making them more secure, efficient, and scalable. This is central to our Legacy Modernization expertise, where we breathe new life into old systems, and also plays a significant role in Software Project Delivery, ensuring that modernized systems are robust and future-proof.

scala.title: Scala
scala.text: Scala’s blend of functional and object-oriented programming makes it ideal for developing complex, high-performance applications. Lunatech’s expertise in Scala ensures that we can deliver software solutions that are both powerful and maintainable, supporting your long-term business objectives.

java.title: Java
java.text: Java is a foundational language for enterprise-level software development. At Lunatech, we use Java to build robust, scalable, and secure applications that can be deployed across various platforms. Our deep expertise in Java allows us to deliver solutions that meet your business’s most demanding requirements.

kotlin.title: Kotlin
kotlin.text: Kotlin is a modern programming language that offers enhanced productivity, safety, and interoperability with Java. We use Kotlin to develop backend services, and full-stack solutions, providing you with modern, efficient, and high-quality software.

typescript.title: Typescript
typescript.text: TypeScript is a statically typed superset of JavaScript that adds optional types, enabling error detection at compile time. Developed by Microsoft, it enhances JavaScript with strong typing, classes, and interfaces, making it ideal for building large, maintainable applications. TypeScript compiles to JavaScript, ensuring compatibility with existing code and modern browsers.

aws.title: AWS
aws.text: AWS is a comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform that offers over 200 fully-featured services from data centers globally. We use AWS to build scalable, secure, and resilient applications that can handle your business's most demanding workloads. Our expertise ensures that your cloud infrastructure is optimized for performance, cost-efficiency, and security.

googlecloud.title: Google Cloud
googlecloud.text: Google Cloud provides powerful tools for data analytics, machine learning, and application deployment. Lunatech leverages these capabilities to create high-performance solutions that enable data-driven decision-making and foster innovation within your organization. Our deep knowledge of Google Cloud services ensures seamless integration with your existing infrastructure and operations.

azure.title: Azure
azure.text: As a leading cloud platform, Azure offers a broad range of services to support application development, data storage, and AI-driven insights. Our proficiency in Azure allows us to deliver tailored cloud solutions that enhance productivity, drive digital transformation, and scale with your business. We ensure that your applications are efficiently deployed and managed in the Azure environment, providing a robust foundation for your digital initiatives.

openshift.title: Openshift
openshift.text: Red Hat OpenShift is a powerful container orchestration platform based on Kubernetes, enabling the development, deployment, and management of containerized applications. At Lunatech, we use OpenShift to help businesses streamline their development processes, improve application portability, and achieve greater agility in their IT operations. Our expertise ensures that your containerized applications are scalable, secure, and easy to manage.

webapi.title: Web API
webapi.text: A Web API (Application Programming Interface) enables software applications to communicate over the internet using HTTP requests. It allows developers to access and interact with a web service's functionality or data, facilitating system integration and enabling client-side applications to use server-side resources.

akka.title: Akka/Pekko
akka.text: Akka is a powerful toolkit for building highly concurrent, distributed, and resilient systems. At Lunatech, we use Akka to develop applications that can handle large volumes of data and high levels of concurrency while maintaining responsiveness and reliability. This is particularly useful for building real-time applications and microservices architectures.

esb.title: ESB
esb.text: ESBs centralize and streamline communication between various enterprise systems, reducing the complexity of integration. Lunatech implements ESB solutions to facilitate the integration of disparate systems, ensuring that your business processes are efficient, flexible, and scalable. Our expertise in ESBs allows us to create a unified IT environment that supports your business goals.

jwt.title: JWT
jwt.text: JWT (JSON Web Token) is a compact, secure token format used for transmitting information between parties, often for authentication and authorization in web apps. It contains user data in a JSON object, is signed for integrity, and allows servers to verify identity without storing session data.

gitlab.title: Gitlab
gitlab.text: GitLab is a web-based DevOps platform offering tools for version control, CI/CD, and project management. It allows teams to collaborate on code, automate testing and deployment, and manage projects in one place, supporting both public and private repositories.

cloudbees.title: Cloudbees
cloudbees.text: CloudBees is an enterprise software platform focused on automating and optimizing software delivery through continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD). Built on Jenkins, it provides advanced tools for managing, scaling, and securing the CI/CD pipeline, making it ideal for large organizations looking to streamline and accelerate their software development processes.

github.title: Github Actions
github.text: GitHub Actions is an automation platform within GitHub that enables CI/CD workflows. It allows developers to automate tasks like testing and deployment directly from their repositories using YAML-defined workflows triggered by events such as commits or pull requests.

jenkins.title: Jenkins
jenkins.text: Jenkins is an open-source automation server that facilitates continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD). It enables developers to automate the building, testing, and deployment of software by managing and running automated workflows, helping streamline the development process and improve code quality.

playframework.title: Play framework!
playframework.text: Play Framework is an open-source web application framework for Java and Scala that simplifies the development of scalable and reactive web applications. It provides built-in support for asynchronous programming, RESTful APIs, and a reactive model, allowing developers to build high-performance, modern web applications with ease.

spring.title: Spring framework
spring.text: Spring Framework is an open-source framework for building enterprise-level Java applications. It provides comprehensive infrastructure support for developing robust, scalable applications through features like dependency injection, aspect-oriented programming, and transaction management. Spring simplifies application development and enhances modularity by offering a flexible, lightweight container and a suite of tools for web, data, and messaging services.

quarkus.title: Quarkus
quarkus.text: Quarkus is a Kubernetes-native Java framework designed for building efficient, high-performance microservices and cloud-native applications. It optimizes Java for containerized environments by providing fast startup times, low memory usage, and seamless integration with popular tools and technologies, making it ideal for modern, scalable, and reactive applications in cloud environments.

jakartaee.title: JakartaEE
jakartaee.text: Jakarta EE (formerly Java EE) is a set of specifications for enterprise Java development, providing a robust, scalable framework for building multi-tiered, distributed applications. It includes APIs for web services, dependency injection, persistence, and more, enabling developers to create reliable, portable, and high-performance applications across various environments. Jakarta EE aims to streamline enterprise development by offering standardized, modular components that integrate seamlessly with each other.

reactjs.title: ReactJS
reactjs.text: ReactJS is a popular open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications. Developed by Facebook, it allows developers to create reusable UI components and manage the state of web applications efficiently. React’s virtual DOM and component-based architecture enhance performance and facilitate the development of dynamic, interactive user experiences.

nextjs.title: NextJS
nextjs.text: Next.js is a popular open-source framework for React that enables server-side rendering and static site generation, improving performance and SEO for web applications. It simplifies the development of React-based applications by providing features like automatic code splitting, optimized performance, and built-in routing. Next.js allows developers to build scalable, high-performance web applications with minimal configuration.

angularjs.title: Angular
angularjs.text: Angular is a JavaScript framework developed by Google for building dynamic, single-page web applications. It provides features like two-way data binding, dependency injection, and directives to simplify the development of complex, data-driven interfaces. AngularJS enables developers to create modular, maintainable code and facilitates the development of rich, interactive user experiences.

figma.title: Figma
figma.text: Figma is a cloud-based design tool used for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and design systems. It offers real-time collaboration, allowing multiple users to work on the same design simultaneously. Figma's vector-based design capabilities, along with features like interactive prototyping and design systems, make it a popular choice for UI/UX design, enabling teams to streamline their design workflows and enhance collaboration.

integration.title: Integration
integration.text: We help you to integrate your applications and data, whether they are on-premise or in the cloud, using the best open source technologies.

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.title: Let's work
contact.text: Let us help you become even greater at what you do. Send us an email so we know more.

expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.title: Defined Vehicle
expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.text: A Software Defined Vehicle is any vehicle that manages its operations, adds functionality and enables new features primarily or entirely through software. Software Defined Vehicles are the next evolution of the automotive industry. Lunatech has been involved with Software Defined Vehicle since 2016 while the term did not exist yet. Lunatech, together with large automobile manufacturers has been involved in processing car data at a large scale and providing services for those vehicles. Lunatech specialises in cloud middleware and processing data for software-defined vehicles.

paragraphes[0].title: Strategic Expertise: Crafting Synergy Between Digital and Business Strategy
paragraphes[0].text1: In today’s fast-paced market environment, the ability to swiftly adapt to new trends and customer needs is crucial for maintaining a competitive edge. The question is: how can your organization stay ahead? The answer lies in creating a seamless integration between your digital strategy and business strategy, ensuring that both are not only aligned but also mutually reinforcing. This involves configuring your systems with flexibility, fostering a culture of continuous innovation, and responding to changes with agility and intelligence.
paragraphes[0].text2: A robust architecture plays a pivotal role in this integration by providing critical insights into how changes impact various aspects of your business. It serves as the blueprint for defining roadmaps that are in lockstep with your business objectives. By creating a comprehensive overview of the connections between business processes, organizational structures, and technology, architecture simplifies complexity and equips you with the tools to make informed, strategic decisions that drive your organization forward.

paragraphes[1].title: Implementation from Vision to Reality
paragraphes[1].text1: At Lunatech, we believe in the power of simplicity, particularly when it comes to translating strategy into action. A well-defined architecture allows us to formulate a clear and actionable IT strategy that is not just aspirational but also achievable. Our approach is rooted in practicality; we immerse ourselves in your business environment to gain a deep understanding of your unique challenges and opportunities. By combining our technical expertise with domain-specific knowledge, we craft solutions that are tailored to your organization’s needs.
paragraphes[1].text2: Our involvement goes beyond the surface-level aspects of technology implementation. We provide comprehensive support across various critical areas, including change management, data governance, risk management, and the optimization of management processes. With a wealth of experience in digital transformation projects, we offer end-to-end support, guiding you from the initial stages of strategy development through to the final implementation. Our goal is to ensure that your technology infrastructure not only meets but exceeds your organization’s expectations in terms of functionality, availability, flexibility, and scalability. We move beyond theoretical strategies, bringing them to life in a way that offers tangible, lasting benefits to your organization.

paragraphes[2].title: Collaborative Innovation: A Partnership for Growth
paragraphes[2].text1: Achieving a successful alignment of digital and business strategies is not a solitary endeavor; it requires close collaboration between our team and yours. We start by working together to define a clear objective, grounded in your organization’s mission and vision. We understand that the rapidly evolving landscape of technology can be overwhelming, and that you may not be familiar with all the possibilities it offers. That’s where our expertise comes in.
paragraphes[2].text2: Through a series of inspiration sessions, we explore the vast array of technological innovations that could propel your organization forward. Whether it’s adopting cutting-edge cloud solutions, leveraging artificial intelligence, implementing machine learning, or embracing continuous deployment practices, we guide you through the possibilities and help you envision what’s possible. But we don’t stop there. We believe in empowering your team, equipping your employees with the knowledge and skills to analyze and architect both business and information systems effectively. This education fosters an internal culture of innovation and agility, enabling your organization to stay ahead of the competition and continue evolving.

paragraphes[3].title: Sustained Success Through Strategic Insight
paragraphes[3].text1: The outcome of this collaborative process is a digital strategy that is not just aligned with your business goals but is also a driving force for growth and innovation. With a strong architectural foundation, your organization gains the clarity needed to navigate complexity, the agility to adapt to change, and the strategic insight to make decisions that lead to sustained success. In a world where the only constant is change, our approach ensures that your organization remains not just responsive, but proactive—ready to seize new opportunities and overcome challenges with confidence.
paragraphes[3].text2: At Lunatech, we are not just consultants; we are your partners in realizing the full potential of your digital strategy. Together, we can create a future where technology and business strategy are in perfect harmony, driving your organization to new heights.

softwareDefinedVehicule.title: Powering the Future of Mobility with Advanced Backend Solutions
softwareDefinedVehicule.description: The automotive industry is undergoing a radical transformation with the advent of Software-Defined Vehicles (SDVs). As vehicles become more connected, autonomous, and intelligent, the need for robust, scalable, and secure backend systems becomes critical. Lunatech is at the forefront of this transformation, providing cutting-edge backend solutions that enable automotive manufacturers and suppliers to build, deploy, and manage SDVs effectively.

paragraphes[0].title: Scalable Cloud Infrastructure
paragraphes[0].text: At the heart of every SDV is a powerful backend system that manages data, updates, and services in real time. Lunatech specializes in building scalable cloud infrastructures using leading platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, and Red Hat OpenShift. Our cloud solutions ensure that your backend systems can handle the massive amounts of data generated by SDVs, providing real-time processing, storage, and analytics capabilities.

paragraphes[1].title: Data Management and Analytics
paragraphes[1].text: SDVs generate vast amounts of data from sensors, cameras, and other onboard systems. Managing and analyzing this data is crucial for optimizing vehicle performance, enhancing safety, and delivering personalized user experiences. Lunatech offers comprehensive data management and analytics solutions that allow automotive companies to collect, store, process, and analyze SDV data efficiently. Our solutions support everything from predictive maintenance to personalized infotainment services.

paragraphes[2].title: Microservices Architecture
paragraphes[2].text: To manage the complexity of SDV backend systems, Lunatech employs a microservices architecture. This approach allows us to develop and deploy individual components independently, making the system more flexible, scalable, and easier to maintain. Our microservices-based backend systems enable faster development cycles, easier updates, and better fault isolation, ensuring that your SDV systems remain agile and resilient.

paragraphes[3].title: Security and Compliance
paragraphes[3].text: With the increasing connectivity of SDVs comes the need for enhanced security measures. Lunatech provides end-to-end security solutions for SDV backend systems, ensuring that data is protected at every stage of its journey. Our security offerings include encryption, access control, intrusion detection, and compliance with industry standards and regulations. We help automotive companies safeguard their SDVs against cyber threats, ensuring the safety and privacy of users.

paragraphes[4].title: API Management and Integration
paragraphes[4].text: SDV backend systems often need to interact with various third-party services, such as navigation providers, payment systems, and cloud-based services. Lunatech offers comprehensive API management and integration services that enable seamless communication between your SDV systems and external platforms. Our API solutions are designed to be secure, scalable, and easy to manage, allowing for the rapid integration of new services and features.

conclusion.title: Transform Your Vehicles with Lunatech
conclusion.text: As the automotive industry shifts towards software-defined vehicles, having the right backend systems is crucial for success. Lunatech is your trusted partner in this transformation, offering advanced backend solutions that power the next generation of connected, autonomous, and intelligent vehicles. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you build and manage the backend systems that drive your SDV initiatives.

paragraphes[0].title: Expertise in Automotive and IT
paragraphes[0].text: Lunatech brings together deep expertise in both the automotive industry and IT, enabling us to deliver backend solutions that are perfectly aligned with the unique needs of SDVs.

paragraphes[1].title: Tailored Solutions
paragraphes[1].text: We understand that every automotive company has different requirements. That’s why we offer customized backend solutions that meet your specific needs, whether you’re developing autonomous vehicles, connected cars, or electric vehicles.

paragraphes[2].title: End-to-End Service
paragraphes[2].text: From initial consultation and design to development, deployment, and ongoing support, Lunatech provides end-to-end services that ensure the success of your SDV initiatives.

paragraphes[3].title: Cutting-Edge Technology
paragraphes[3].text: We leverage the latest technologies and best practices in cloud computing, data management, and cybersecurity to deliver backend systems that are robust, scalable, and future-proof.

paragraphes[4].title: Commitment to Innovation
paragraphes[4].text: At Lunatech, we are committed to driving innovation in the automotive industry. We continuously invest in research and development to stay at the forefront of SDV technology, ensuring that our clients benefit from the latest advancements.

expertiseLegacyModernisation.title: Legacy
expertiseLegacyModernisation.title2: Transforming Your Legacy Systems for the Future
expertiseLegacyModernisation.description: In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, outdated legacy systems can become a significant obstacle to business growth and innovation. These systems, while critical to your operations, often lack the flexibility, efficiency, and scalability required to meet current and future business needs. Lunatech’s Legacy Modernization Services are designed to transform your aging IT infrastructure into modern, agile systems that align with your strategic objectives and leverage the latest technologies.
expertiseLegacyModernisation.description2: Legacy systems, though reliable, can hinder your organization in several ways:

paragraphes[0].title: High Maintenance Costs
paragraphes[0].text: Older systems are often expensive to maintain, with increasing costs for support, updates, and repairs.

paragraphes[1].title: Limited Scalability
paragraphes[1].text: Legacy systems may struggle to scale in response to growing business demands, leading to performance bottlenecks

paragraphes[2].title: Integration Challenges
paragraphes[2].text: Connecting legacy systems with modern applications and platforms can be difficult, leading to inefficiencies and data silos.

paragraphes[3].title: Security Risks
paragraphes[3].text: Legacy systems may lack the necessary security features to protect against modern cyber threats, putting your organization at risk.

paragraphes[4].title: Inflexibility
paragraphes[4].text: Legacy systems are often rigid, making it hard to implement new features or adapt to changing business needs.

expertiseLegacyModernisation.conclusion: Modernizing these systems can help your business overcome these challenges, reduce costs, and unlock new opportunities for innovation and growth.

paragraphes[5].title: Comprehensive Assessment and Strategy
paragraphes[5].text: Lunatech begins every modernization project with a thorough assessment of your existing legacy systems. We analyze their current state, evaluate their alignment with your business goals, and identify areas for improvement. Based on this assessment, we develop a tailored modernization strategy that addresses your specific needs, whether it’s a full system overhaul, incremental upgrades, or targeted enhancements.

paragraphes[6].title: Reverse Engineering and Documentation
paragraphes[6].text: Understanding the intricacies of legacy systems is crucial for a successful modernization project. Lunatech employs reverse engineering techniques to deconstruct your legacy systems, documenting their functionality, architecture, and dependencies. This detailed documentation serves as a blueprint for the modernization process, ensuring that critical business functions are preserved and enhanced during the transition.

paragraphes[7].title: Technology Stack Upgrade
paragraphes[7].text: Modernizing your legacy systems often involves upgrading to a more current and powerful technology stack. Lunatech helps you select and implement the right technologies—such as modern programming languages, frameworks, and cloud platforms—to replace outdated components. This upgrade not only improves system performance but also enhances compatibility with new technologies and standards.

paragraphes[8].title: Data Migration and Integration
paragraphes[8].text: Migrating data from legacy systems to modern platforms is a critical aspect of the modernization process. Lunatech ensures a seamless and secure data migration, preserving data integrity and minimizing downtime. We also provide integration services to connect your modernized systems with other applications, ensuring a cohesive and unified IT environment.

paragraphes[9].title: UI/UX Modernization
paragraphes[9].text: Legacy systems often feature outdated user interfaces that can hinder productivity and user satisfaction. Lunatech offers UI/UX modernization services to redesign your system’s interface, making it more intuitive, user-friendly, and visually appealing. By enhancing the user experience, we help improve adoption rates and overall system efficiency.

paragraphes[10].title: Security Enhancements
paragraphes[10].text: Security is a top priority in any modernization project. Lunatech enhances the security of your modernized systems by implementing the latest security protocols, encryption methods, and compliance measures. We ensure that your systems are protected against modern cyber threats, safeguarding your data and maintaining regulatory compliance.

paragraphes[11].title: Testing and Quality Assurance
paragraphes[11].text: To ensure that your modernized systems function as intended, Lunatech conducts rigorous testing and quality assurance processes. We test for functionality, performance, security, and usability, identifying and resolving any issues before the system goes live. Our comprehensive QA process ensures a smooth transition to the new system with minimal disruption to your operations.

paragraphes[12].title: Training and Knowledge Transfer
paragraphes[12].text: Modernizing legacy systems often involves a steep learning curve for your team. Lunatech provides training and knowledge transfer services to ensure that your staff is fully equipped to manage and operate the modernized systems. We offer hands-on training sessions, detailed documentation, and ongoing support to help your team adapt to the new technology seamlessly.

paragraphes[13].title: Change Management
paragraphes[13].text: Successful modernization requires effective change management. Lunatech works closely with your organization to manage the transition from legacy to modern systems, ensuring that all stakeholders are informed, engaged, and supportive of the change. Our change management services help minimize resistance, foster adoption, and ensure the long-term success of the modernization project.

expertiseLegacyModernisation.title5: Transform Your Legacy Systems with Lunatech
expertiseLegacyModernisation.description3: Ready to bring your legacy systems into the future? Lunatech’s Legacy Modernization Services provide the expertise, technology, and support you need to transform your IT infrastructure. Contact us today to learn how we can help you modernize your legacy systems, reduce costs, and drive innovation.

expertiseSystemIntegration.title: System
expertiseSystemIntegration.title2: Seamless Integration for a Cohesive IT Environment
expertiseSystemIntegration.description: In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, businesses often rely on a complex mix of applications, systems, and platforms to support their operations. However, managing these disparate systems can lead to inefficiencies, data silos, and operational bottlenecks. Lunatech’s System Integration services are designed to overcome these challenges by connecting and streamlining your IT environment, enabling seamless data flow and efficient business processes.

paragraphes[0].title: End-to-End Development
paragraphes[0].text: We offer comprehensive software development services that cover the entire project lifecycle. From initial consultation and requirements gathering to design, development, testing, and deployment, we manage every aspect of the development process. This end-to-end approach ensures that your software solution is delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.

paragraphes[1].title: Comprehensive API Integration
paragraphes[1].text: APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) are the backbone of modern system integration, enabling different software applications to communicate and share data. Lunatech specializes in designing and implementing robust API integrations that connect your various applications, databases, and services. Whether it’s integrating third-party services or building custom APIs for internal systems, our team ensures that your IT environment operates as a unified whole.

paragraphes[2].title: Middleware Solutions
paragraphes[2].text: Middleware acts as a bridge between different systems, allowing them to communicate and work together effectively. Lunatech provides middleware solutions that facilitate the integration of complex systems, enabling you to connect legacy systems with modern applications, streamline data exchange, and enhance overall system performance. Our middleware expertise ensures that your integrated systems are scalable, reliable, and easy to manage.

paragraphes[3].title: Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) Implementation
paragraphes[3].text: For organizations with a large number of interconnected systems, an Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) can provide a centralized integration platform. Lunatech offers ESB implementation services that help you manage and orchestrate interactions between different applications and services across your enterprise. Our ESB solutions enable real-time data exchange, reduce redundancy, and improve the agility of your IT infrastructure

paragraphes[4].title: Akka (or Pekko) for Distributed Systems
paragraphes[4].text: When it comes to integrating distributed systems that require high scalability and fault tolerance, Lunatech leverages Akka (or Pekko), a powerful toolkit and runtime for building concurrent, distributed, and resilient message-driven applications. Akka( or Pekko) enables us to create systems that can handle a large number of transactions and users, ensuring that your business processes run smoothly even under heavy loads.

paragraphes[5].title: Data Integration and Management
paragraphes[5].text: Effective system integration requires seamless data exchange between different applications and systems. Lunatech offers comprehensive data integration services, including data migration, data transformation, and data synchronization. We ensure that your data is accurate, consistent, and accessible across all integrated systems, supporting better decision-making and enhanced business intelligence.

paragraphes[6].title: Legacy System Integration
paragraphes[6].text: Integrating legacy systems with modern applications can be challenging, but it’s essential for maintaining operational continuity while embracing new technologies. Lunatech specializes in legacy system integration, enabling your existing systems to communicate with new platforms and applications. Our solutions extend the life of your legacy systems while ensuring they work in harmony with modern technologies.

paragraphes[7].title: Cloud Integration Services
paragraphes[7].text: As more businesses move to the cloud, integrating cloud-based applications and services with on-premises systems becomes crucial. Lunatech provides cloud integration services that connect your cloud applications with existing IT infrastructure, ensuring a seamless hybrid environment. Our expertise in cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, and Red Hat OpenShift ensures that your cloud integration is secure, scalable, and efficient.

paragraphes[8].title: Increased Efficiency
paragraphes[8].text: By integrating your systems, you can automate workflows, reduce manual processes, and eliminate data silos, leading to more efficient operations.

paragraphes[9].title: Enhanced Data Accuracy:
paragraphes[9].text: Integrated systems provide real-time data exchange, ensuring that your business has access to accurate and up-to-date information across all platforms.

paragraphes[10].title: Improved Decision-Making
paragraphes[10].text: With a unified view of your data, your organization can make more informed decisions, driving better business outcomes.

paragraphes[11].title: Scalability
paragraphes[11].text: Lunatech’s integration solutions are designed to scale with your business, allowing you to add new systems and applications as your needs evolve.

paragraphes[12].title: Cost Savings
paragraphes[12].text: By integrating your systems, you can reduce the need for redundant software and hardware, leading to significant cost savings over time.

expertiseSystemIntegration.title5: Why Choose Lunatech for System Integration?

paragraphes[13].title: Extensive Experience
paragraphes[13].text: With years of experience in system integration, Lunatech has the expertise to handle complex integration projects across various industries.

paragraphes[14].title: Custom Solutions:s
paragraphes[14].text: We understand that every business is unique, which is why we offer tailored integration solutions that meet your specific needs and objectives.

paragraphes[15].title: End-to-End Service
paragraphes[15].text: From initial consultation and planning to implementation and ongoing support, Lunatech provides comprehensive integration services that ensure a smooth and successful integration process.

paragraphes[16].title: Proven Technologies
paragraphes[16].text: We utilize the latest technologies and best practices in system integration, ensuring that your integrated systems are secure, reliable, and future-proof.

paragraphes[17].title: Dedicated Support
paragraphes[17].text: Our commitment to your success doesn’t end with the integration. We provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure that your integrated systems continue to operate efficiently.

expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.title: Project Delivery
expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.title2: Tailored Solutions for Your Unique Business Needs
expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.description: At Lunatech, we understand that every business is unique, with its own set of challenges and goals. Off-the-shelf software solutions often fall short of meeting specific business requirements, which is why we specialize in custom software development. Our team of experienced developers works closely with you to create software solutions that are precisely tailored to your needs, ensuring that your business can operate more efficiently, innovate faster, and achieve its strategic objectives.

paragraphes[0].title: End-to-End Development
paragraphes[0].text: We offer comprehensive software development services that cover the entire project lifecycle. From initial consultation and requirements gathering to design, development, testing, and deployment, we manage every aspect of the development process. This end-to-end approach ensures that your software solution is delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.

paragraphes[1].title: Business Analysis and Requirements Gathering
paragraphes[1].text: Whether you need a customer-facing web application, an internal business tool, or a complex enterprise system, our team has the expertise to deliver. We build web applications that are secure, scalable, and tailored to your specific use case. Our developers are skilled in the latest web technologies and frameworks, ensuring that your application is modern, responsive, and easy to maintain.

paragraphes[2].title: Custom Web Applications
paragraphes[2].text: To manage the complexity of SDV backend systems, Lunatech employs a microservices architecture. This approach allows us to develop and deploy individual components independently, making the system more flexible, scalable, and easier to maintain. Our microservices-based backend systems enable faster development cycles, easier updates, and better fault isolation, ensuring that your SDV systems remain agile and resilient.

paragraphes[3].title: Legacy System Modernization
paragraphes[3].text: If you’re dealing with outdated legacy systems that are holding your business back, Lunatech can help. We specialize in modernizing legacy applications, making them more efficient, secure, and compatible with today’s technology standards. Our modernization services include re-engineering legacy systems, migrating data, and updating user interfaces to create a more intuitive and powerful solution

paragraphes[4].title: Integration with Existing Systems
paragraphes[4].text: A new software solution must work harmoniously with your existing IT infrastructure. Lunatech ensures seamless integration of new applications with your current systems, databases, and third-party services. Our integration expertise allows us to create solutions that enhance your business processes without disrupting your operations.

paragraphes[5].title: Agile Development and Continuous Delivery
paragraphes[5].text: At Lunatech, we follow agile development methodologies, allowing us to be flexible and responsive to your changing needs throughout the development process. We prioritize frequent communication and iteration, ensuring that the final product aligns perfectly with your vision. Our continuous delivery approach means that new features and updates can be deployed rapidly, keeping your software current and competitive.

paragraphes[6].title: Rigorous Testing and Quality Assurance
paragraphes[6].text: Quality is at the core of everything we do. Our dedicated QA team rigorously tests your software throughout the development process to identify and resolve any issues before launch. This includes functional testing, performance testing, security testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT), ensuring that your software is reliable, secure, and ready for deployment.

paragraphes[7].title: Post-Launch Support and Maintenance
paragraphes[7].text: Our commitment to your success doesn’t end with the deployment of your software. Lunatech provides ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your application continues to operate smoothly and security patches are applied continuously. We offer a range of support options, from troubleshooting and bug fixes to regular updates and enhancements, helping you keep your software in peak condition.

expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.title4: Why Choose Lunatech for Custom Software Development?

paragraphes[8].title: Deep Technical Expertise
paragraphes[8].text: Our team consists of seasoned developers with extensive experience across a wide range of technologies, ensuring that we can deliver high-quality solutions tailored to your specific needs.

paragraphes[9].title: Client-Centered Approach
paragraphes[9].text: We place a strong emphasis on collaboration and communication, working closely with you at every stage of the project to ensure that the final product exceeds your expectations.

paragraphes[10].title: Proven Track Record
paragraphes[10].text: With years of experience delivering successful projects across various industries, Lunatech has a proven track record of helping businesses achieve their goals through custom software solutions.

paragraphes[11].title: Scalable Solutions
paragraphes[11].text: We build software that grows with your business, ensuring that your solution remains relevant and effective as your needs evolve over time.

paragraphes[12].title: Commitment to Quality
paragraphes[12].text: From the initial concept to post-launch support, we are committed to delivering software that is reliable, secure, and of the highest quality.

partners.title: Our
partners.subtitle: Partners
partners.text: At Lunatech, we recognize the value of strategic alliances and collaboration in driving innovation and delivering top-notch solutions. Our partnerships with industry-leading technology providers and open-source communities enable us to leverage cutting-edge technologies and offer comprehensive, tailored solutions to meet our clients' diverse needs. Discover our key partnerships below.

paragraphes[0].title: Redhat
paragraphes[0].subtitle: Cloud Computing, Containerization, and Open-Source Technologies
paragraphes[0].text: Lunatech collaborates with Red Hat to integrate enterprise solutions such as Red Hat OpenShift with our expertise. This partnership enhances our digital transformation projects by providing robust, scalable, and secure cloud and containerization solutions

paragraphes[1].title: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
paragraphes[1].subtitle: Cloud Infrastructure and Services
paragraphes[1].text: Partnering with AWS allows Lunatech to leverage AWS’s scalable cloud services to support modern application development. This collaboration enables us to deliver flexible, high-performance cloud-based infrastructure to our clients.

paragraphes[2].title: Google Cloud
paragraphes[2].subtitle: Cloud Computing and Data Analytics
paragraphes[2].text: Our partnership with Google Cloud provides advanced cloud solutions, including data analytics and machine learning capabilities. This collaboration supports our clients in harnessing the power of cloud computing and data-driven insights.

paragraphes[3].title: Microsoft Azure
paragraphes[3].subtitle: Cloud Services and Enterprise Solutions
paragraphes[3].text: Partnering with Microsoft Azure gives Lunatech access to a broad range of scalable cloud services. This support aids in modernizing IT environments and offering flexible solutions tailored to client needs.

paragraphes[4].title: Eclipse Foundation
paragraphes[4].subtitle: Open-Source Software Development and Tools
paragraphes[4].text: As an active contributor to the Eclipse Foundation, Lunatech collaborates on various open-source projects. This involvement supports the advancement of the Eclipse ecosystem and enhances our capabilities in developing open-source solutions.

paragraphes[5].title: Clever Cloud
paragraphes[5].subtitle: Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) for Application Deployment and Management
paragraphes[5].text: Our partnership with Clever Cloud allows us to offer advanced PaaS solutions that simplify application deployment, scaling, and management. This collaboration supports cloud-native development and provides clients with efficient and scalable application management.

paragraphes[6].title: Azul
paragraphes[6].subtitle: Java Runtime Environments and Performance Optimization
paragraphes[6].text: Lunatech partners with Azul to provide high-performance Java Runtime Environments (JRE) and JVM solutions. This partnership helps us deliver optimized and reliable Java applications, supporting our clients in achieving superior performance and scalability.

paragraphes[7].title: Cloudbees
paragraphes[7].subtitle: Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
paragraphes[7].text: Partnering with CloudBees allows Lunatech to offer advanced CI/CD solutions that streamline the software development lifecycle. This collaboration supports efficient, automated, and scalable software delivery, enhancing our clients' development processes and time-to-market.

paragraphes[8].title: Lightbend
paragraphes[8].subtitle: System Integration and reactive system
paragraphes[8].text: Lunatech's partnership with Lightbend focuses on developing reactive systems using technologies like Akka and Play Framework. This collaboration enhances Lunatech’s capabilities in delivering scalable and resilient applications, providing them with advanced training and a competitive edge in reactive programming and microservices architecture. The partnership strengthens Lunatech's position in delivering high-performance enterprise solutions.

opensource.title: Open
opensource.text1: Lunatech plays a significant role in the open-source community, demonstrating a growing commitment to this initiative. Its active participation in Quarkus, Conferencess, as well as its contribution to the Dotty directory, testify to its strong interest in the development and promotion of open-source technologies. This involvement not only underlines Lunatech's expertise in emerging technologies, but also contributes to enriching the open-source ecosystem, fostering knowledge sharing and collaborative innovation. Lunatech can help you with your open source strategy and connect the open source softwares within your organisation. Lunatech open-source contributions are a significant part of our culture and approach to software development. They regularly develop and release open-source tools, libraries, and frameworks that address common challenges in software engineering and system integration. These contributions not only support their own projects but also help other developers and organizations tackle similar issues. Some of the areas where Lunatech contributes include

list1.title: Open-Source Libraries and Frameworks
list1.text: Lunatech develops and maintains a variety of open-source libraries and frameworks that are used by developers around the world. These tools often focus on areas like web development, data processing, system integration, and DevOps, providing robust, well-documented solutions that can be easily integrated into other projects.

list2.title: Community Engagement
list2.text: Lunatech encourages its developers to actively participate in open-source projects outside of the company's initiatives. This includes contributing code to existing projects, offering bug fixes, adding new features, and helping with project maintenance. Our team members often engage with the community through forums, GitHub repositories, and mailing lists, where they share knowledge and collaborate with other developers.

list3.title: Open-Source Events and Sponsorship
list3.text: Lunatech supports and sponsors open-source conferences, hackathons, and workshops. These events are opportunities for developers to come together, learn from each other, and collaborate on open-source projects. By sponsoring and participating in these events, Lunatech helps to foster a vibrant and collaborative open-source community.

list4.title: Educational Resources
list4.text: Lunatech also contributes to the open-source ecosystem by creating and sharing educational content, such as tutorials, blog posts, and documentation. These resources are designed to help other developers learn how to use open-source tools effectively, and they often include examples of how Lunatech has used these tools in real-world projects.

list5.title: Internal Projects Released as Open Source
list5.text: Many of Lunatech’s internal projects, developed to solve specific problems we encountered in our work, are eventually released as open-source software. This approach not only showcases our technical expertise but also allows other organizations to benefit from our innovations.

list6.title: Commitment to Open-Source Principles
list6.text: Lunatech’s involvement in open source reflects a broader commitment to the principles of transparency, collaboration, and community-driven development. By contributing to open-source projects, they help to drive the collective progress of the software industry, ensuring that valuable tools and technologies are available to all.

opensource.text2: Through these activities, Lunatech not only enhances its own technological capabilities but also contributes to the broader software development community, helping to push the boundaries of what is possible with open-source software.
opensource.text3: Lunatech is also involved and part of the following organisations

list7.title: Eclipse Foundation
list7.text: The Eclipse Foundation is a non-profit organization that supports and governs a diverse range of open-source software projects, most notably the Eclipse IDE. Established in 2004, it fosters collaborative development by providing the infrastructure and governance necessary for high-quality open-source projects. The Foundation’s mission includes driving innovation, integrating software tools, and growing a vibrant ecosystem through its well-defined governance structure, diverse membership, and active community involvement. It hosts significant projects like Eclipse Che and Eclipse Vert.x, and organizes events such as EclipseCon to promote its technologies and facilitate collaboration.

list8.title: SDV Eclipse
list8.text: We are a member of the Eclipse Software Defined Vehicle (Eclipse SDV) working group, an open technology platform dedicated to the enhancement and development of software-defined vehicle technologies. As an active member of the Eclipse SDV group, we work closely with other industry players to drive innovation and adoption of open standards in the area of software-defined vehicles. This collaboration enables us to stay at the forefront of the latest technological advances and actively contribute to shaping the future of the automobile.

list9.title: EOS Consortium
list9.text: EOS consortium is shaping a resilient, open and collaborative digital landscape to ensure Europe's leadership in global innovation. Together, best-in-class companies build Europe's digital future, shaping a continent where organizations achieve digital sovereignty, break free from proprietary technology dependencies, foster innovation, and strengthen local economies.

list10.title: Scala ecosystem
list10.text: Lunatech has actively contributed to the Scala ecosystem by developing and maintaining libraries, enhancing popular frameworks like Akka and Play, and engaging with the Scala community through conferences and educational resources. They have supported open-source projects and provided valuable insights and improvements to Scala-related technologies. Additionally, Lunatech was a member of the Scala Center, an organization dedicated to supporting and advancing the Scala programming language and its ecosystem.

list11.title: Quarkus
list11.text: Lunatech contributes to Quarkus by enhancing the framework's functionality, improving its integration capabilities, and addressing various issues to ensure a robust and efficient development experience. Our work includes contributing code, providing bug fixes, and developing features that align with Quarkus's goals of optimizing Java applications for Kubernetes and cloud-native environments. Lunatech's involvement supports the framework's growth and adoption, helping to advance its capabilities and support for modern, scalable, and performant applications.

list12.title: Play Framework Contribution
list12.text: Lunatech has made significant contributions to the Play Framework, a popular reactive web framework for Java and Scala, by enhancing its core functionality and extending its capabilities. Our involvement includes developing new features, fixing bugs, and improving integration with other technologies, which helps maintain Play Framework’s position as a leading choice for building scalable and high-performance web applications. By actively participating in the Play community and providing valuable feedback, Lunatech supports the framework’s evolution and ensures that it continues to meet the needs of modern developers, contributing to a more robust and efficient tool for creating dynamic web applications.

list13.title: Akka Contribution
list13.text: Lunatech has been a proactive contributor to Akka, the powerful toolkit for building concurrent, distributed, and resilient applications on the JVM. our contributions include enhancements to Akka’s core libraries, performance optimizations, and support for new features, which help improve the framework’s functionality and scalability. By engaging with the Akka community and addressing key challenges, Lunatech helps advance the toolkit’s capabilities and ensures it remains a reliable and cutting-edge solution for developers building complex, distributed systems. Our ongoing involvement underscores our commitment to supporting and evolving essential open-source technologies in the realm of concurrent and distributed computing.

opensource.text4: Lunatech demonstrates its commitment to open source through active contributions to a diverse array of high-impact projects, including Scala, Akka, Play Framework, and Quarkus. By developing and maintaining libraries, enhancing frameworks, and participating in key open-source communities, Lunatech not only improves the functionality and usability of these technologies but also fosters innovation and collaboration within the open-source ecosystem. Our engagement extends to supporting and advocating for open-source practices, sharing expertise through educational resources, and contributing to the advancement of cutting-edge tools and solutions. This dedication highlights Lunatech’s role as a vital supporter of open-source software, driving progress and enabling the broader community to benefit from our technical expertise and collaborative spirit.
